summary: Simple mod that adds the ability to throw a coin into many wells in Skyrim and receive a bonus to gold found in chests in return.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][center][u]Wishing Wells[/u][/center][/size]
Simple mod that adds the ability to throw a coin into many wells in Skyrim and receive a bonus to gold found in chests in return. This bonus works exactly like the Imperial Luck racial bonus but will also stack with it. The buff lasts approximately one in game day (72 minutes) then the gold gain is removed. The buff can be reapplied whenever by visiting any of the available wells.

I've added this to as many of the wells as I could find but I may still have missed a few. Currently you can use the wells in the following locations:
[list][*]Whiterun[/*]
[*]Solitude[/*]
[*]Falkreath[/*]
[*]Bloated Mans Ruins[/*]
[*]Frostflow Lighthouse[/*]
[*]Fellglow Keep[/*]
[*]Fort Dunstad[/*]
[*]Trevas Watch[/*]
[*]Fort Neugrad[/*]
[*]Fort Snowhawk[/*]
[*]Fort Greymoor[/*]
[*]Fort Sungard[/*]
[*]Dushnikh Yal
[/*]
[/list]
Hopefully these should all be working as intended.

(Note: if you are using v1 of the mod only Whiterun will be working)
author: TheImpersonator
